greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least k such that the base-2 representation of n begins at s(k), where s=A030190 (or equally A030302).
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
formula: a(n) = 1 iff n belongs to A055143. - _Rémy Sigrist_, Feb 20 2021
program: (Perl) $bb = ""; foreach $n (0..66) { print index($bb .= $b = sprintf("%b", $n), $b), ", "; } # _Rémy Sigrist_, Aug 19 2020
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
ext: Minor edits by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 16 2017
